BugInstance.message: com.TWCC.api.ResponseParser.extractAddress(Map) concatenates strings using + in a loop
com.TWCC.api.ResponseParser.extractAddress(Map) makes inefficient use of keySet iterator instead of entrySet iterator
Redundant nullcheck of updatedEvent, which is known to be non-null in com.TWCC.controller.EventController.updateEvent(HashMap)
com.TWCC.data.Event.getCreationTimestamp() may expose internal representation by returning Event.creationTimestamp
com.TWCC.data.Event.getEndTimestamp() may expose internal representation by returning Event.endTimestamp
com.TWCC.data.Event.getStartTimestamp() may expose internal representation by returning Event.startTimestamp

new com.TWCC.data.Event(int, String, int, String, String, double, double, float, String, int, String, Timestamp, Timestamp, Timestamp) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into Event.creationTimestamp

new com.TWCC.data.Event(int, String, int, String, String, double, double, float, String, int, String, Timestamp, Timestamp, Timestamp) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into Event.endTimestamp

new com.TWCC.data.Event(int, String, int, String, String, double, double, float, String, int, String, Timestamp, Timestamp, Timestamp) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into Event.startTimestamp

com.TWCC.data.Event.setStartTimestamp(Timestamp) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into Event.startTimestamp
com.TWCC.data.Event defines equals and uses Object.hashCode()
